info.name: Blender Stack Exchange Dark Theme
info.description: Dark Theme for Blender Stack Exchange
info.additionalInfo:
You might need to reinstall the theme for each update to show.

14.12.2019 Update to fix text color in input fields
28.7.2019 Update to display the info under question title correctly
27.4.2019 Updated to correctly display the new yellow sidebar widget
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Updated for the new site design with left-bar navigation.

Removes "New Contributor" notes that are spammed all over the place for low rep users. They are themed though and to enable it delete .new-contributor-indicator{display: none;} from last section of the style.

Key color values of the theme are now driven by global variables in the first section of the theme, you can customize them.
